texts.content: {"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,14],"size":8.0}],"text":"这个能不能帮我换成一个黑色的"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,12],"size":8.0}],"text":"呃皮绒的话只能干洗就可以"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,15],"size":8.0}],"text":"仿皮绒的话你们干洗就行了好不好"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,13],"size":8.0}],"text":"在我直播的时候你到处找再找"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,15],"size":8.0}],"text":"那个我配了一个新款的蓝色的烟花"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,16],"size":8.0}],"text":"人家做直播真的都一定是先定直播价"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,13],"size":8.0}],"text":"结婚这种的衣服结婚谁真的作"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,14],"size":8.0}],"text":"这件韩呃法国进口的一个原麻料"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,15],"size":8.0}],"text":"哇这上身的质感真的你们会爱惨我"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,12],"size":8.0}],"text":"这件是真正进口的一个法国"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,13],"size":8.0}],"text":"夏天穿起来是嫩感通透肉感的"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,12],"size":8.0}],"text":"你就算挂在那里有一点褶皱"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,12],"size":8.0}],"text":"挂在那里一会直接又回弹了"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,15],"size":8.0}],"text":"很棒哦来准备一下我们的这个轮泽"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,15],"size":8.0}],"text":"真的每天看你直播一点不带寂寞的"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,16],"size":8.0}],"text":"你就算袖子别一点点起来穿也很好看"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,14],"size":8.0}],"text":"我觉得这件卡码都拍小拍打也行"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,12],"size":8.0}],"text":"这件的亚麻料结合拉架睫毛"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,15],"size":8.0}],"text":"超哥帮我先准备100单的现货哦"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,15],"size":8.0}],"text":"你收到货了之后你们真的会很惊艳"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,15],"size":8.0}],"text":"一定要好好享受这上面天然的麻结"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,13],"size":8.0}],"text":"不然等下用剃毛器给我剃了啊"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,15],"size":8.0}],"text":"这就是上面自带的天然的亚麻麻结"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,12],"size":8.0}],"text":"左上角的关注给我全部点上"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,12],"size":8.0}],"text":"我穿的就是你们收到的大货"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,15],"size":8.0}],"text":"本身整件衣服就是法国法国进口的"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,16],"size":8.0}],"text":"特别是跟我一样肩宽胸大一点姐妹们"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,12],"size":8.0}],"text":"然后呢更加深邃显瘦选灰色"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,15],"size":8.0}],"text":"有一点镰刀的一个痞帅高级大牌感"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,13],"size":8.0}],"text":"然后呢也是专治各种腿不服啊"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,13],"size":8.0}],"text":"这里面也是加了有天丝的成分"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,14],"size":8.0}],"text":"我再帮你们把这个杏灰色也一样"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,14],"size":8.0}],"text":"也可以配这一条焦点裤子的一个"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,15],"size":8.0}],"text":"帮我焦点浅色也帮我再加一个链接"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,14],"size":8.0}],"text":"我会给你们去做一个精准的穿搭"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,12],"size":8.0}],"text":"好不好硬挺感也是非常好的"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,12],"size":8.0}],"text":"然后呢这件就是我们的这个"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,16],"size":8.0}],"text":"可以先挑一两件你们特别喜欢的现货"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,14],"size":8.0}],"text":"先下单主打的就是让你心急如坑"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,13],"size":8.0}],"text":"所以这个是进口的一个丝光码"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,12],"size":8.0}],"text":"直播间我只做高货的搬运工"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,18],"size":8.0}],"text":"超哥 450最后一个尺码帮我踢掉5单"}

{"styles":[{"fill":{"alpha":1.0,"content":{"render_type":"solid","solid":{"alpha":1.0,"color":[1.0,1.0,1.0]}}},"font":{"id":"","path":"/Applications/VideoFusion-macOS.app/Contents/Resources/Font/SystemFont/zh-hans.ttf"},"range":[0,15],"size":8.0}],"text":"我的朋友都说你就是高货的搬运工"}
